description.p: C-mile is a professional cross-platform disk imaging utility designed for writing disk images to USB drives and SD cards. It provides a user-friendly graphical interface for creating bootable USB devices and formatting storage media.

ul.li: Write ISO, IMG, and other image formats to USB drives and SD cards
Automatic detection and listing of connected storage devices
Real-time progress indication with speed and time estimation
Optional verification after writing to ensure data integrity
Option to force write operations even on protected devices
Built-in formatting functionality for various file systems
Customizable block sizes for optimized performance
